Hi Milt,

You would have to ask the team about the menuki, but the fuchi-ka=
shira
should be ok. You cannot submit it as a tsuka, but as fuchi-kashira a=
nd then
menuki, so two separate papers. As for the period, you should get E=
do shoki,
Edo zenki, Edo chuki, Edo koki, Edo maki, Bakumatsu, Meiji and th=
e like.

Gordon
